content:
This standard describes JYSK requirements for care labels.

|   Section | Changes                                                                                                                                                           |
|----------:|:------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
|       nan | Morocco-importer information must be in continuation of the Arabic product information and “made in [country of origin]”. Care label examples update accordingly. |
|       nan | UK-Importer information must only be on care label if there is no other sales packaging, e.g. hangtag, clamp.                                                     |

| 0                                                                                                                                                |
|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Care labels                                                                                                                                      |
| r= =a) 80] 910)                                                                                                                                  |
| Use of sym 00) ee                                                                                                                                |
| Instruction COXUS ..cccccccccccccccecccceucceeucceeucceeuuceeueceeucceeuceeeuceeeucceeucceeucceeuceeeuceeeuceeeeceteueeteueeteueeseueeteueeseugs |
| Care label layouts for duvets ANd PillOWS ........ cece cece eect ee ee ee eR Eee EEE EEE EERE EERE EERE EERE REE EEE                            |
| Specific requirements for products to UK And Ireland ........ccc eee ce cece ee eee ene e eee eee nee                                            |

Page 1/5

All textile based products must have a care label.

Care label layout must comply with JYSK 6201.

The care label must unless otherwise specified be double printed and as short as possible.

Care labels must contain:

1. Brand logo

2. Product name and info in English

3. Care symbols according to 1.1

4. Information in text in all languages according to JYSK General Requirements:

• Product type/info

• Fibre composition in % and specification of other materials in accordance with JYSK 4004.

• Shrinkage in % if more than 5% from nominal dimension.

• Additional care instructions in text in accordance with 1.2:

• The sentences “Wash before use” must be added if the product is within below categories: Note: Other product types can be labelled with “Wash before use” if agreed with CAM.

• Bed linen

• Sheets

• Towels and face cloth

• Dishcloths

• Tea towels

• Table cloths

• Clothing; like bath robes, underwear, t-shirts and stockings.

• The sentence “Wash together with similar colors” must be added if the product is washable.

• In accordance with JYSK 6101 the Arabic product information must include:

• “made in [country of origin]” in Arabic language. It must be placed in continuation of the Arabic product information.

• Morocco-importer information must be in continuation of the Arabic product

information and “made in [country of origin]”.

5. The care label must include product labelling in accordance with JYSK 6101.

Note: UK-importer information must only be on care label if there is no other sales packaging, e.g. hangtag, bellyband, clamp.

6. Barcode in accordance with JYSK 6101 if required.

7. OEKOTEX label as applicable according to JYSK General Requirements.

8. TRIMAN symbol in accordance with JYSK 6101.

9. Any additionally required or agreed information.

Edition 5 – 2024-07 Compliancequality@JYSK.com

Care label symbols must be according to EN ISO 3758. The symbols are available as JYSK 10070.

| 0                           | 1      | 2                                                           |
|:----------------------------|:-------|:------------------------------------------------------------|
| © Washing                   | ia     | Very mild process                                           |
| © Washing                   | nan    | Hand wash (Max 40°C)                                        |
| © Washing                   | EE     | Hand wash mild process                                      |
| © Washing                   | nan    | Do not wash                                                 |
| A Bleaching                 | >      | Any bleaching agent allowed                                 |
| A Bleaching                 | nan    | Only oxygen/non-chlorine bleach allowed                     |
| A Bleaching                 | KS     | Do not bleach                                               |
| Drying                      | eS KC) | Tumble drying possible. Normal temperature (Max 80°C)       |
| Drying                      | ry So  | Tumble drying possible. Lower temperature (Max 60°C)        |
| Drying                      | nan    | Do not tumble dry                                           |
| 0 Natural drying            | lol    | Flat drying                                                 |
| 0 Natural drying            | nan    | Drip drying                                                 |
| A Ironing and pressing      | By     | Iron at maximum sole plate temperature of 200°C             |
| A Ironing and pressing      | nan    | Iron

at maximum sole plate temperature of 150°C             |
| A Ironing and pressing      | BE     | Iron at maximum sole plate temperature of 110°C             |
| A Ironing and pressing      | sw     | Iron without steam                                          |
| A Ironing and pressing      | nan    | Do not iron                                                 |
| O Professional textile care | IONORK | Mild process                                                |
| O Professional textile care | nan    | Very mild process                                           |
| O Professional textile care | @      | Cleaning in Tetrachloroethene and all solvents listed for F |
| O Professional textile care | nan    | Cleaning in Hydrocarbonans                                  |
| O Professional textile care | {Z1©/@ | Professional wet cleaning                                   |
| O Professional textile care | nan    | No wet cleaning                                             |

Do not dry clean

Symbol examples – Do not use!

The symbols must appear in the order washing, bleaching, and drying, ironing and professional care.

These 5 treatment instructions are mandatory. Additional drying and professional care symbols may be added if necessary. For further instruction, contact JYSK C&Q.

If all the 3 treatment symbols below are crossed (not drying and ironing), another relevant treatment must be recommended (E.g. “Spot cleaning only”) in all JYSK languages.

The use of other additional words may be necessary to avoid any harm to the product.

The number of additional words in the label must be kept to a minimum.

| - remove ...before washing                      | - professional leather clean only   |
|:------------------------------------------------|:------------------------------------|
| - wash separately                               | - no optical brighteners            |
| - wash with like colors                         | - use wash net                      |
| - wash before use                               | - do not steam iron                 |
| - wash inside out                               | - steam only                        |
| - do not wring or twist                         | - do not soak                       |
| - damp wipe only                                | - steam iron recommended            |
| - do not add fabric conditioner                 | - dry away from direct heat         |
| - remove promptly                               | - reshape whilst damp               |
| - iron reverse side only                        | - line dry                          |
| - do not iron decoration                        | - reshape and dry flat              |
| - use press cloth                               | - drip dry                          |
| -

dry flat                                      | - dry away from the sun             |
| - The washing machine must load at least xx kg. | nan                                 |

For duvets and pillows the care label is also a product information label.

Languages must comply with JYSK 1008.

Care labels for duvets and pillows must additionally (to the requirements in chapter 1) contain the following information:

• For natural filling, the “filling power line” must be mentioned.

• If needed - information about standards:

For naturel filling: EN 12130 - EN 12131 - EN 12934.

• The fill weight in grams. After care.

Duvets and pillows must have the following on care labels:

• On duvets: “Single”, “Double”, “King” or a “Super King”.

• TOG value.

See JYSK 4002 for FR requirements.
Edition 5 – 2024-07 Compliancequality@JYSK.com

Section Changes Morocco-importer information must be in continuation of the Arabic product information and “made in [country of origin]”. Care label examples update accordingly. 1 UK-Importer information must only be on care label if there is no other sales packaging, e.g. hangtag, clamp. 1 & 2 Care label examples are updated according to above.
Edition 5 – 2024-07 Compliancequality@JYSK.com
All textile based products must have a care label.
Care label layout must comply with JYSK 6201.
The care label must unless otherwise specified be double printed and as short as possible.
Care labels must contain:
2. Product name and info in English
3. Care symbols according to 1.1
4. Information in text in all languages according to JYSK General Requirements:
• Fibre composition in % and specification of other materials in accordance with JYSK 4004.
• Shrinkage in % if more than 5% from nominal dimension.
• Additional care instructions in text in accordance with 1.2:
• The sentences “Wash before use” must be added if the product is within below categories: Note: Other product types can be labelled with “Wash before use” if agreed with CAM.
• Towels and face cloth
• Clothing; like bath robes, underwear, t-shirts and stockings.
• The sentence “Wash together with similar colors” must be added if the product is washable.
• In accordance with JYSK 6101 the Arabic product information must include:
• “made in [country of origin]” in Arabic language. It must be placed in continuation of the Arabic product information.
• Morocco-importer information must be in continuation of the Arabic product information and “made in [country of origin]”.
5. The care label must include product labelling in accordance with JYSK 6101.
Note: UK-importer information must only be on care label if there is no other sales packaging, e.g. hangtag, bellyband, clamp.
6. Barcode in accordance with JYSK 6101 if required.
7. OEKOTEX label as applicable according to JYSK General Requirements.
8. TRIMAN symbol in accordance with JYSK 6101.
9. Any additionally required or agreed information.

Edition 5 – 2024-07 Compliancequality@JYSK.com
1.1.1 Use of symbols
The symbols must appear in the order washing, bleaching, and drying, ironing and professional care.
These 5 treatment instructions are mandatory. Additional drying and professional care symbols may be added if necessary. For further instruction, contact JYSK C&Q.
If all the 3 treatment symbols below are crossed (not drying and ironing), another relevant treatment must be recommended (E.g. “Spot cleaning only”) in all JYSK languages.
The use of other additional words may be necessary to avoid any harm to the product.
The number of additional words in the label must be kept to a minimum.

- remove …before washing - professional leather clean only - wash separately - no optical brighteners - wash with like colors - use wash net - wash before use - do not steam iron - wash inside out - steam only - do not wring or twist - do not soak - damp wipe only - steam iron recommended - do not add fabric conditioner - dry away from direct heat - remove promptly - reshape whilst damp - iron reverse side only - line dry - do not iron decoration - reshape and dry flat - use press cloth - drip dry - dry flat - dry away from the sun - The washing machine must load at least xx kg.
Examples of additional wording
Edition 5 – 2024-07 Compliancequality@JYSK.com
2 Care label layouts for duvets and pillows
For duvets and pillows the care label is also a product information label.
Languages must comply with JYSK 1008.
Care labels for duvets and pillows must additionally (to the requirements in chapter 1) contain the following information:
• For natural filling, the “filling power line” must be mentioned.
• If needed - information about standards:
For naturel filling: EN 12130 - EN 12131 - EN 12934.
• The fill weight in grams. After care.

2.1 Specific requirements for products to UK and Ireland
Duvets and pillows must have the following on care labels:
• On duvets: “Single”, “Double”, “King” or a “Super King”.
See JYSK 4002 for FR requirements.
